text: A chariot could be imported from Egypt for six hundred shekels of silver,10:29 600 shekels is approximately 15.1 pounds or 6.8 kilograms of silver. and a horse for a hundred and fifty.10:29 150 shekels is approximately 3.8 pounds or 1.7 kilograms of silver. Likewise, they exported them to all the kings of the Hittites and to the kings of Aram.
